Fanatical Flurry.name: Fanatical Flurry
Fanatical Flurry.flavor: You launch a reckless attack against your chosen enemy and all foes nearby, ignoring your own safety.
Fanatical Flurry.target: Your oath of enmity target and each enemy in the burst
Fanatical Flurry.effect: You take a –2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Battle Rapture.name: Battle Rapture
Battle Rapture.flavor: You enter a state of zealous passion, consumed by the power of your faith. Defeating your sworn enemy is a test of faith for you.
Battle Rapture.effect: Until the stance ends, your attacks deal extra damage against your oath of enmity target equal to 1d10 + one-half your level. In addition, when any ally deals damage (not ongoing damage) to your oath of enmity target, you take 3d6 damage.

Irresistible Ardor.name: Irresistible Ardor
Irresistible Ardor.flavor: Your spirit blazes with devotion, lending holy power to your strike. Your sworn enemy’s attacks are as nothing to you.
Irresistible Ardor.onHit: 4[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. You regain the use of an encounter power that you have already used during this encounter.
Irresistible Ardor.effect: Until you attack a creature other than your oath of enmity target or until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the attacks of your oath of enmity target.
